sprint_goal: Establish the core, secure backend transformation engine and its essential guardrails.
Build the foundational UI for script management, including the rich editor and CRUD operations.
Implement the script preview functionality and secure script storage with encryption.
Deliver advanced script management features (versioning, diff) and implement RBAC with audit trails.
Focus on operational readiness, advanced compliance, and migration planning. Note: This sprint is overloaded and should be split.
